ai.nuralogix.anurasdk.render

Interface Render

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public interface Render
extends AutoCloseable
    Interfaces of rendering video frame, regions, histogram, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Render.UpdateFrameListener
      Listener interface is called when render gets new frame update

      • setHistogramsColor

        void setHistogramsColor(int a,
                        int r,
                        int g,
                        int b)
        Sets histogram's color
        Parameters:
        a - The new alpha component (0..255) of the paint's color.
        r - The new red component (0..255) of the paint's color.
        g - The new green component (0..255) of the paint's color.
        b - The new blue component (0..255) of the paint's color.
